name: Cyberwrite Ltd.
description: Developer of a cyber insurance risk quantification technology platform intended to offer a full stack of solutions to sell, underwrite and manage the risk of cyber policies. The company's platform offers real-time on-demand cyber risk assessment of any business for use cases of cyber insurance and vendor risk management, enabling brokers to sell more policies in an efficient and profitable manner for both the brokers and the reinsurers.
one_liner: Developer of a cyber insurance risk quantification technology platform intended to offer a full stack of solutions to sell, underwrite and manage the risk of cyber policies.
